kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.1/cli/args/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

Element Should Be Visible

kw.doc: Stops executing the enclosing FOR loop if the ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Fail
kw.arg: Invalid discount type: ${use_discount} must be 'have_discount' or 'no_discount'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Then System should display notify message as
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Proceed payment successfully"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Proceed payment successfully"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Proceed payment successfully"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Proceed payment successfully"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Proceed payment successfully"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Proceed payment successfully"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Proceed payment successfully"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Proceed payment successfully"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Proceed payment successfully"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Proceed payment successfully"]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: Element '//XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Proceed payment successfully"]' text is 'Proceed payment successfully'
kw.doc: Get element text (for hybrid and mobile browser use `xpath` locator, others might cause problem)

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Set Test Message
kw.msg: Set test message to: validation error message with 'Proceed payment successfully'
kw.doc: Sets message for the current test case.

kw.name: And System should display text on screen as
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Your payment is confirmed!"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Your payment is confirmed!"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Your payment is confirmed!"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Your payment is confirmed!"]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: Element '//XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="Your payment is confirmed!"]' text is 'Your payment is confirmed!'
kw.doc: Get element text (for hybrid and mobile browser use `xpath` locator, others might cause problem)

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Set Test Message
kw.msg: Set test message to: validation error message with 'Your payment is confirmed!'
kw.doc: Sets message for the current test case.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

test.doc: Verify cash payment flow with fixed amount discount on iOS
test.status: validation error message with 'Your payment is confirmed!'

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.
